title: BOC expands/collapses filter section of Approvals
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to the Approvals clipboard
AND there is a filter section pinned on top of the Approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the expand/collapse button
custom_expected:
THEN filter section expands and collapses
AND layout follows wireframe and DD
AND functionality matches that of the story

title: BOC saves Approvals settings as default
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a filter for the Approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the link 'save as default'
custom_expected: THEN filter settings display every time clipboard is loaded

title: BOC sees club's Action Items
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to the Action Items widget
AND has permissions
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the org filter
AND selects a club
custom_expected:
THEN clubs list alphabetically
AND user sees club's action items

title: BOC deletes club's Action Items
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a club's action item(s)
custom_expected:
THEN successful blue notification
AND item is removed from widget

title: User approving a Release tx moves any Pending Add C's to preliminary
custom_expected: On Approve of a Release of a minor league player, if the player has any Tendered or Pending Approval Addendum C's - the Addendum C should be moved back to a preliminary state.

title: BOC Approving Release tx terminates MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a release tx for a player w/a MNC
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the release tx
custom_expected:
THEN MNC status is terminated
AND terminated comment populates on MNC

title: User can see what year each player signed their first Contract in MN roster widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to MNR Roster widget
custom_expected: THEN The column will be populated for each player with the year the player first signed a contract (major or minor) with MLB. This will need to look to "Start Year" from the contract - not the signing date.

title: User can see earliest year each player is eliogible to be Free Agent in the MN roster widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to the MNR Roster widget
custom_expected: THEN The column will be populated for each player with the value displayed on their player profile.

title: BOC Approving Free Agent tx expires MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a FA tx with a player w/MNC
custom_expected:
THEN Player's minor contract status updates to 'Expired'. 
AND Contract gains a comment "Expired on [date] [time] by [Approver of the transaction]." Comment should not overwrite any other existing comments. *(Won't need this depending on the new MNC summary area)

title: User is able to navigate to a PPP Service tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected: THEN "Minor League Free Agent Year" and "Potential Minor League Free Agent" fields will be populated.

title: User prevented from creating MN tx for MJ player
custom_expected: For all minor league transactions except for the place on NES list the system should check on create if the player is currently playing at the minor league level. If no, then display an error.
